conversion_verification.notes: The conversion represents a clean isometric-style 3D cutaway of the original architectural plan.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and consistent isometric projection; slight lack of ceiling-top wall texture but geometric corners are precise.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Strong layout fidelity; all three bedrooms and main living areas are correctly placed. Minor simplification of the complex entrance/bathroom cluster near the bottom left.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture sets (beds, sofa, dining table, kitchen counters) are present and logically sized, mirroring the 2D suggestions.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity and clean rendering; lighting is effective for depth perception; no UI text contamination.

detected_errors.description: The balcony on the left side is rendered as more of a small outdoor alcove compared to the plan's specific shape.
The detailed plumbing layout for the central/entrance bathrooms is simplified into generic spatial volumes.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D isometric conversion that maintains excellent structural fidelity to the original 2D floor plan.
